name: G√©n√©rer des Reels Instagram avec Veo3 et GPT pour la cr√©ation d'annonces aliment√©es par l'IA
description:
üé¨ G√©n√©rateur de Reels Instagram Veo3 ‚Äì Cr√©ation d'annonces aliment√©e par l'IA en quelques minutes

Description :
Ce flux de travail sans code transforme votre brief cr√©atif en un Reel Instagram engageant en utilisant OpenAI et l'API Veo3 (via Wavespeed) ‚Äî enti√®rement automatis√© dans n8n. Il vous suffit de taper un produit, un th√®me ou une tendance via le chat, et d'obtenir une vid√©o courte plus une l√©gende livr√©e et enregistr√©e, pr√™te √† √™tre publi√©e.

Parfait pour les marketeurs, cr√©ateurs et √©quipes de contenu cherchant √† augmenter leur production de contenu publicitaire sans embaucher d'√©diteurs ou d'agences cr√©atives.

Regardez le tutoriel vid√©o √©tape par √©tape ici :
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

‚öôÔ∏è Comment √ßa fonctionne :
üí¨ D√©clencheur de chat
‚ÄÉCommencez par envoyer un message comme ¬´ Cr√©ez une annonce pour une marque de parfum minimaliste utilisant la tendance ‚Äòluxe discret‚Äô. ¬ª

üß† Ing√©nieur de prompt (ChatGPT)
‚ÄÉG√©n√®re un prompt vid√©o descriptif de 5 √† 8 secondes adapt√© √† Veo3 bas√© sur votre saisie ‚Äî y compris le ton visuel, le mouvement et l'accroche.

üì° Appel API √† Veo3 via Wavespeed
‚ÄÉSoumet le prompt pour cr√©er une courte vid√©o (ratio 9:16, ~8 secondes), puis interroge l'URL finale de la vid√©o.

‚úçÔ∏è G√©n√©rateur de l√©gende (GPT)
‚ÄÉCr√©e une l√©gende adapt√©e √† Instagram √† associer √† la vid√©o, en utilisant un style d'√©criture ludique et percutant.

üìÑ Int√©gration Google Sheets
‚ÄÉEnregistre chaque prompt vid√©o g√©n√©r√©, l'URL finale de la vid√©o, la l√©gende et le statut dans une feuille Google pour une gestion et une planification faciles.

üîå Outils et int√©grations :
OpenAI GPT (G√©n√©ration de prompt & r√©daction de l√©gende)

Veo3 via l'API Wavespeed (G√©n√©ration de vid√©o)

values.content:
You are a creative video prompt generator for short-form ads (e.g., Instagram, TikTok). Based on:

The chat input of the user

Your task is to craft a concise, visually descriptive video generation prompt suitable for input into the Seedance API.

üõë Do not include any extra explanation, formatting, or commentary. Your entire output must be the exact prompt to pass into the video generator.

The prompt should:
‚Äì Be under 100 words
‚Äì Describe the visual elements, tone, and motion clearly
‚Äì Reflect the product or brand type, and
‚Äì Incorporate the marketing trend as the core concept or hook

Example of your expected output format:

‚ÄúA close-up slow-motion shot of a glass perfume bottle as morning sunlight filters through mist. The background shows soft-focus wildflowers, matching the theme of natural beauty and calm. Overlay text: ‚ÄòNature‚Äôs Elegance. Reinvented.‚Äô Trend-inspired styling based on the ‚Äòquiet luxury‚Äô aesthetic. For Instagram. 5 seconds.‚Äù
=Based on this video generation prompt, create an impactful accompanying caption for the Instagram Post {{ $('Prompt Engineer').item.json.message.content }}

You're an Instagram Caption copywriter. You'll receive a set of video prompt message that is used for generating an Instagram 5 second reel video. Your job is to write an effective accompanying caption. Language style should be playful and impactful.

parameters.content:
üé¨ Veo3 Instagram Reel Generator ‚Äì AI-Powered Ad Creation in Minutes
Description:
This no-code workflow transforms your creative brief into an engaging Instagram Reel using OpenAI and Veo3 API (via Wavespeed) ‚Äî fully automated in n8n. Just type a product, theme, or trend via chat, and get a short-form video plus caption delivered and logged, ready to post.

Perfect for marketers, creators, and content teams looking to scale their ad content output without hiring editors or creative agencies.

Watch step-by-step build video tutorial here:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

‚öôÔ∏è How It Works:
üí¨ Chat Trigger
‚ÄÉStart by sending a message like ‚ÄúCreate an ad for a minimalist perfume brand using the ‚Äòquiet luxury‚Äô trend.‚Äù

üß† Prompt Engineer (ChatGPT)
‚ÄÉGenerates a 5‚Äì8 second descriptive video prompt suitable for Veo3 based on your input ‚Äî including visual tone, motion, and hook.

üì° API Call to Veo3 via Wavespeed
‚ÄÉSubmits the prompt to create a short video (9:16 ratio, ~8 seconds), then polls for the final video URL.

‚úçÔ∏è Caption Generator (GPT)
‚ÄÉCreates an Instagram-friendly caption to pair with the video, using a playful, impactful writing style.

üìÑ Google Sheets Integration
‚ÄÉLogs each generated video prompt, final video URL, caption, and status into a Google Sheet for easy management and scheduling.

üîå Tools & Integrations:
OpenAI GPT-4o (Prompt generation & caption copywriting)

Veo3 via Wavespeed API (Video generation)

Google Sheets (Content tracking and publishing queue)

Telegram / Chat UI trigger (Optional ‚Äì easily swappable)

üí° Use Cases:
Instagram & TikTok ad generation

Creative automation for digital agencies

Short-form UGC testing at scale

Trend-driven campaign ideation

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
